snippet: Disease outbreaks should be monitored in cities with a lot of air travel to London as the Summer Games approach, authors in The Lancet Infectious Diseases say.
abstract: Series of articles published in journal The Lancet Infectious Diseases explores the possibility that the 2012 Summer Olympics in London could trigger a global outbreak of disease.
lead_paragraph: Disease outbreaks should be monitored in cities with a lot of air travel to London as the Summer Games approach, authors in The Lancet Infectious Diseases say.

headline.seo: Assessing Disease Risks at London’s Summer Olympics
headline.main: Friendship, Competition, Pathogens: Gauging an Outbreak at the Olympics
headline.print_headline: London: Friendship, Competition, Pathogens: Gauging an Outbreak at the Olympics
